name: Hunting Unlimited 4
description: Hunting Unlimited 4 combines traditional hunting game elements with a fast-paced mission-based system, for intense hunting action.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7600, ATI Radeon X13000, Intel GMA X3000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7600, ATI Radeon X13000, Intel GMA X3000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible Sound Card
